metadata.Title: CVE-2014-2060 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The Winstone servlet container in Jenkins before 1.551 and LTS before 1.532.2 allows remote attackers to hijack sessions via unspecified vectors.

notes.Note: seth-arnold> SECURITY-106 is not visible as of 2014-02-21

criterions.comment: jenkins-winstone: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
